title: Promos is broken or bugged
body:
i didn't get promoted after winning my 2nd match to gold 2, i got 1 free win as i went to promos (because i lost last time) but after winning it, game didn't say anything and i am still same rank could you please fix or check such issue

happen at 5:56am today thanks you

replies.body:
Assuming you didn't afk or dc at all (which would result in a loss for you) I'd recommend submitting a ticket to Player Support:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

No i didn't afk or dc, i have full game play thanks to replay option, i don't know why but it doesn't count as a loss or win because it still states 2 games left for promo, i will give a try to support, but its useless as they don't really help although i hope they will look into it and try to fix it so it won't happen to others.
